## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G18165](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G18165)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MOS4</u>
- **Gene Name:** Modifier of snc1,4
- **Description:**   modifier of snc1,4;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G18165.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G18165.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS69914]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Late flowering. Reduced seed set. Enhanced susceptibility to virulent and avirulent pathogens. 
   - [CS69914]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;suppresses the autoimmunity-related phenotypes of snc1.
   - [mos4-1 snc1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;suppresses the autoimmunity-related phenotypes of snc1.
   - [muse1-1 mos4 snc1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;snc1-like dwarfism with curled leaves, elevated PR1 and PR2 protein levels, enhanced resistance restored similar to observed in snc1 plants against H. arab. Noco2.
